CmdLine: echo "deb http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu trusty main universe" > /etc/apt/sources.list &&   apt-get update && apt-get install -y   nginx php5 php5-fpm supervisor;   service supervisor stop;   sed -i -e"s/keepalive_timeout\s*65/keepalive_timeout 2/" /etc/nginx/nginx.conf;   sed -i -e"s/keepalive_timeout 2/keepalive_timeout 2;\n\tclient_max_body_size 100m/" /etc/nginx/nginx.conf;   echo "daemon off;" >> /etc/nginx/nginx.conf;   sed -i -e '/listen = 127.0.0.1:9000/ s/127.0.0.1:9000/\/var\/run\/php5-fpm.sock/' /etc/php5/fpm/pool.d/www.conf;   mkdir /var/www &&   echo "<?php phpinfo(); ?>" > /var/www/phpinfo.php &&   chown -R www-data:www-data /var/www;   apt-get clean;   rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* /tmp/* /var/tmp/*
Commands.Name: run
